plays.text: Penalty to Mats Sundin 2 minutes for High Sticking Mariusz Czerkawski

Penalty to Alyn McCauley 2 minutes for Hooking Brad Isbister

Penalty to Michael Peca 2 minutes for Tripping Cory Cross

Penalty to Shayne Corson 2 minutes for Roughing Steve Webb
Penalty to Mariusz Czerkawski 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Darcy Tucker
Penalty to Kenny Jonsson 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Jonas Hoglund
Goal scored by Cory Cross assisted by Travis Green and Jyrki Lumme
